higherSubsidy.description: Applies to each child other than the eldest child in approved care. The younger child's CCS rate is the greater of their standard rate OR the eldest child's rate + 30 percentage points (capped at 95%).
higherSubsidy.appliesTo: All children except the eldest child currently in approved childcare

hourlyRateCaps._label: Centre Based Day Care — children not yet at school
Centre Based Day Care — school-age children
Outside School Hours Care — before/after school & vacation care
In Home Care — per family (not per child)

annualSubsidyCap._note: Families earning above $85,279 are subject to an annual CCS cap of $11,003 per child. Families earning $85,279 or below have no annual cap.

threeDayGuarantee.description: From 5 January 2026, all eligible families receive a minimum of 72 subsidised hours per fortnight regardless of their activity test result. This is the '3-Day Guarantee'.

_withholdingNote: Services Australia withholds 5% of CCS each fortnight. The withheld amount is reconciled at end of financial year and refunded or used to offset any debt.
